If I wanted to spend an hour wasting a whole pack of watercolor paper, I still would not have gone here. Terrible customer service as well.

name: Ashley Vanderhoof
text: Great customer service, very helpful and friendly!

name: STEVEN PARKER
text: My great aunt owns the place

name: Heather Watson
text: Order was ready super fast.

name: Melody Davis
text: Love the work

name: Bryan Lee
text: Hate to do this, but I feel the lack of professionalism and skill needs to be addressed with this company. I had this company do a sign for one of my retail stores, and the job is still not finished. I was first told 4 to 6 weeks, and it has been over six months and they have still not completed what they continued to promise that they would. I understand the coronavirus played a factor, but this job was supposed to be done before the virus ever hit, and after the virus slowed and they were back to work around May, I was continually told “we are understaffed due to the virus” and “ I will try to get it done this Friday”. I am not sure why the completion of my project continues to be pushed behind others.

resp.text: Brian I covered those holes months ago. Is that what you are referring to?

name: Cindy Wilt
text: So happy with the signs on my pet grooming trailer. The design is awesome, and the service was great! No hidden costs, no delays and it turned out better than I had imagined.

name: Scootie Dabbs
text: I have used Sign Pro for over a decade now for signage needs. They are ALWAYS very helpful, accommodating and easy to work with. In over a decade I have never had a problem with them and their customer service is amazing. I highly recommend them!

name: Tracy Deng
text: Great value, family operation, friendly staff. We have been trying to get the new sign for business for 2 month, only this one could get the job done. 5 Star.

resp.text: Thank you for the business. Come see us again

name: Jennifer McEachern
text: Delivered my sign and it was of wonderful quality! The customer service is awesome and we are so happy with our purchase! We will do business again with them!

name: Chase Matthews
text: I have used Sign Pro for more than 13 years and the staff is always helpful, with all my projects, no matter the timeline or complexity of the project.  Great company!

name: Dionne Williams
text: I totally recommend Sign Pro and Brian for your signage needs. He is a pleasure to work with. Professional and very courteous!

name: Mickey Bott
text: Did an awesome job with the vinyls on the doors of my tow truck

resp.text: Thanks so much.

name: Karen Yates
text: 5 STAR !!! No need to look any further <3   Amazing service, Excellent quality, Excellent people <3 Amazing mgmt.

name: Springhill Medical Center
text:
Always a great job and rush is offered too.
Would be nice to add your phone number to your Google+ page.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business we really appreciate it.. Thanks for the heads up on the pnone number, just added phone number. Hope we can help you again soon.

name: Emily LaBiche
text: Sign Pro does amazing work! I have used them countless times and I am always pleased with their work and their customer service! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Dan Garland
text: Great job thanks!

name: Dan Andouille
text: I've used Sign Pro for years and my company grew to a point that I hired a marketing manager.  She recently ordered signs from an online company instead of Sign Pro and they showed up all wrong.  They also showed up late, which wouldn't matter but they were for an event that was 2 days away.  I called Sign Pro and let them know about the problem and they truly saved the day.  They reprinted the signs and completed the installation for us.  Saved us a lot of embarrassment.  It was a great lesson for my marketing manager to learn - use local trusted guys that have a focus on quality and customer service.

name: Andrew LaBiche
text: Great company to to work with and I plan on doing more business with them in the future. I highly recommend them for all of your sign and graphic needs!!

name: M Rechner
text: Honest, very nice people,  easy to work with.  Can't say enough about the product .. I love my sign !!

name: Jay Friday
text: Sign Pros professionalism and quality is awesome!  I recommend them to anyone.

name: 3 Echoes Productions
text: Brian and his team were professional, attentive and helpful - excellent service and excellent results! The Today's Homeowner TV crew will be traveling in style!

name: Patrick Morton
text: I chose Sign Pro based on a personal recommendation and I'm glad that i did. The signs that i got were better than i expected. I will go back.

name: R T
text: I went by there to find out the cost to mail something simple 9 x 6 envelope with papers enclosed. I was given a price of $4.36 to mail it. I asked what the store store was (Surcharge) and the lady did not know. I left and did not mail it there. I took it to the post office downtown Decatur, Alabama and the Total cost was only $2. What kind of extra charges is this place charging?

name: Kris Small
text: I've never once been asked what I am shipping ever by any company. I was attempting to ship some very valuable items to my brother in Ca. today and was asked what I was shipping, I stated personal items nothing hazardous. She asked me to describe the item.... that's how they figure out what packages to steal I guess.  because I've had plenty of packages go missing in the mail. if it's hazardous sure I understand but it's not and not on the prohibited list. so they don't need to know. I'll take it to UPS or Fedex next time directly.

name: Joey Anderson
text: I am very impressed with this store and their employees. I was greated before I made it completely through the door. The staff is upbeat and professional. They were able to service all of my needs and super knowledgeable. I will definately be going back. Thank you for such a wonderful experience.

name: Jason Jameson
text: Amazing store, most polite employees, FedEx shipping. Ignore other reviews where people are not posting honest information. The Shipping Store & More offers FedEx shipping and has amazing employees!

name: Jay Boyd
text: The employees are very friendly and helpful at this esablishment. I am exteremly satisfied with their professionalism and expertise. I appreciate their services and friendly smiles.

name: Glen Hunter
text: The 2 clerk's working today were very helpful and professional and handled my packing and shipping needs very quickly. I would definitely recommend this store for all your packing and shipping needs.

name: Bill Jehle
text: As the chief cook and bottle washer of my own business, the kind folks at The Shipping Store are my staff. I could not run my business without them. Shipping and receiving, not a problem. Notary, not a problem. Photocopies, packing material, anything an average office would need, not a problem. Blueprints, full-sized plans that require a plotter, again, not a problem. Plus, it's great to walk in and folks know me by name. Let The Shipping Store be your secret weapon to make your life or business life a little bit easier.

name: Captain_Redpill
text: Won't be going back to this place ever.  The lady working there completely refused to serve me.  Went two miles down the road and had the service performed at the ups store,  without question.   Continue to watch your business fail.

name: Alexa Womack
text: Such a welcoming store! I was greeted by every person in the store upon entering and leaving. They were even willing to get my package ready to go even though it was UPS. I was only there for a few minutes but I really felt that the employees enjoyed their job! Definitely recommend using them.

name: Brian Moran
text: I have to say that I've never been taken care of in the way this team takes care of my needs. As a small business person myself, I appreciate the attention to detail, warm environment, and sincerity I receive when I walk into with The Shipping Store. I've read some of the other reviews and I would have to say that their prices are very fair. They provide a service that I have not seen matched with other big company chain stores. It is an absolute pleasure to do business with these guys!

name: Sandra Austin
text: Anytime I mail from here it takes many days for the package to get anywhere.

name: Christina Morse
text: The employees at The Shipping Store were super friendly and helpful! They did everything they could to save me money on shipping. If you have anything to ship, I would definitely recommend The Shipping Store. They made shipping a breeze!

name: Jennifer Melcher
text: We took in a fragile item and they packed it for us wonderfully. They were super nice and not just to us but to everyone that came in. They also showed us ways they could help our small business save money on shipping and printing. We will definitely use again!

name: John Wallace
text: They do not ship fedex, waste of my, yours and everyone's time.  Fedex sign in window, rude lady behind the counter..DO NOT GO HERE IF YOU ARE TRYING TK SHIP A FEDEX PACKAGE, FALSE ADVERTISEMENT..!!!!!

name: jose villa
text: Waste of time they say they ship fedex but they don't they are limited so you have to go to the one in Madison. Why even call it the ship in store where they can't ship nothing

name: susan hassett
text: I have used The Shipping Store for many years to mail packages, have copies made and faxes sent. I appreciate the professional and friendly staff. Their packaging services help me save time and enable me to send packages hassle-free.

name: Tracy Roberson
text: The staff are always professional and courteous when I bring things in to have shipped.  I wish the same was true of USPS. The Shipping Store has never lost any of my parcels with the many dealings I have had with the business. You can probably guess who has. I will continue to bring my business here as long as they are here. Thank you.

name: Jenna Burfield
text:
Store staff was very rude. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!! I brought in a package to be shipped and asked for documentation stating that I dropped a the package off. The lady behind the counter stated that if I wanted a receipt that I could wait until FedEx picked it from their location and scanned the barcode (who is to say they wouldn't loose my package) or I could drive to Madison.

Edited to inform that I was able to take my package to Walgreens for drop off. The Walgreens staff were friendly and promptly emailed me a recept for my records. THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO EXCUSE for the pushback I received when I asked for a simple drop off receipt from The Shipping Store.

name: Mary McMahan
text: Amanda saved me from losing my $4900.00 ring to a scammer on Craigslist.  I am so grateful to her and to this store for hiring her.  This experience has brought renewed faith that there are still people who work for businesses that genuinely care about their customers !!  Amanda, you are an angel, I will always be grateful for you and I pray blessings upon you and your family !!  The Shipping Store....don't ever let her go !!!!!

name: Laron Hardy
text: Great people, great service!  The Shipping Store is a place where you will be taken care of.  Great folks!

name: AK Lee
text: They offer a great service and and I even paid for the tape it was worth it

name: L D
text: Way overpriced. $0.75/each for stamps! Their shipping costs are also astronomical. I went there to ship a package and was quoted an amount so high that I thought it was a joke. It wasn't. I then went to Staples right down the street to get a quote from their shipping center and it was 50% less. Stay away from this place!

resp.text:
Jill,

Firstly, thank you for patronizing our business.  We take great pride in our friendly, high level of customer service.  As to your comments about our service charges,  If we weren't able to realize some level of margin over our costs, we would not be able to maintain a viable business or be able to offer the level of service that we so pride ourselves in.

Thanks sincerely,
Don Cantrell
The Shipping Store and more...

name: cassandra chittam
text: Closest shipping place to our company.  We will be driving the extra distance to find an actual post office from now on.  Pricing is extremely high to send out items USPS.  When I called asking why they charged my assistant 10.74 for a small FLAT RATE box, I was told they do not honer flat rate shipping.  I then asked why did they not inform my assistant of this and they stated because all she said was she needed to ship these items. The lady behind the counter didn't know what she was doing.  First time she rang up the bill the total came to $4000 for USPS shipping. Wanting to use USPS services for your packages stay away from this place unless you want to pay double what you would if you went to the post office.

resp.text:
Ms. Chittam,
Firstly thank you for patronizing our store.  We take great pride in deliverying friendly, high quality goods and services.  As to your comments about USPS flat rate boxes, we do not offer them as they simply aren't big enough for average small shipments.   Per your comment about the cash register misring, we are sorry but we as humans are not infallable.  Fortunately, our system will catch any errors before the transaction is complete.  We apologize for the momentary delay.   Regarding your comment that our USPS prices are double the Post Office,  yes, we do charge a nominal service charge to cover our overhead and the ability to maintain a viable business thereby offering our customers a level of service they might not realize at the Post Office.    In fact many of our USPS prices are actually lower than the Post Office as we realize volume discounts that an individual would be unable to quality for.

Thank you again for your comments.
Sincerely,
Don Cantrell
President,
The Shipping Store and more...

name: Daryl Piner
text: Excellent service and very friendly people who will go the extra mile to help you.  I reccomend this place to everyone.

name: Lee Bates
text: Always friendly service and they do the job right. I drive extra miles for this quality.

name: Elise van zandt
text: A+++ service! Very friendly staff and super helpful!

name: Rodrigo Banzon
text: Excellent service.  Outstanding staff!

resp.text: Thank you. We take great pride in our level and quality of service.

name: Brenda Caudle
text: Fast and friendly service. The cost was higher than expected.

name: Misty Myres
text: Very rude staff. I called ahead to verify all details and was told something different when I got there leaving me to rush to FedEx in Madison to ship my packages.

resp.text:
Ms. Myres,
Firstly, thank you for patronizing our business.  We pride ourselves in deliverying friendly,  high quality goods and services.  However, we are unable to access your or any other customers FedEx account number to charge shipping to.  We gladly accept FedEx prepaid packages at no charge, which have the shipping label already affixed.  Otherwise we are glad to create a label for you for which there would be a charge.

Respectfully,
Don Cantrell
The Shipping Store and more...

name: Karla Gibson
text: People were Very nice and helpful.  Thank you!

name: John Buckelew
text: I use them for my mailbox, shipping, and FAX service. Professional in every way. Very friendly.

name: Jim Nichols
text: Its like when Butch said to Sundance, "Who ARE those guys?"

name: Rodney Scott
text: Had a legal document that had to be handled asap and the store more than exceeded.

name: Teresa Hutto
text: They are great people!!!

name: Kyle Boden
text: I was in a real pinch and needed something printed quickly. Luckily I chose to call Black Warrior Printing. The person who helped me out went the extra mile to help me and was happy to do so. If you need something printed, I would highly recommend going to Black Warrior Printing!

name: Phoebe Mori
text: Mr. Mike was so helpful and kind in helping me get a huge poster I designed in photoshop printed. He helped me select the proper size of paper that would be the least expensive for me, and he was even able to help me get it done in such a short time frame. Thank you so much, I will be back in the future if I ever need anything printed again!

name: Bailey (Bailey Jean) Barton
text: If you are in or around the Tuscaloosa area, do yourself a favor and go to BWP for ALL of your printing needs. Mr.Mike has helped me with big projects and little projects. He is always so kind, helpful, speedy, and affordable!! The best in town by far!!

name: Rosemary W Buffer
text: Quality Products & Service. Great Options (e.g. weddings, special events, etc.) Efficient, FAST & Reliable! Local Owner Mike is MOTIVATED to help you look great.

name: Brandt LaPish
text: Mike is one of the best vendors I’ve work with. His customer service is outstanding!!

name: Lauren Wilson
text: Mike and everyone over at Black Warrior Printing are awesome!  They are so great to work with!  I highly recommend them!

name: Stephen Shabazz
text: Outstanding  Service! Fast Delivery! I Highly Recommend Black Warrior Printing For All Your Printing Needs.

name: Family Chiropractic
text: Highly recommended!! Fast,friendly,awesome service with a smile. Mike aims to please!

name: Shanna Jennings
text: I am very happy with the stock plan that we purchased and had amended. Initially it was going to be a few small changes, and it turned into a much larger project than anyone anticipated. Throughout all the changes, the team was responsive and quickly turned changes around for approval. They even worked with my builder to finalize a few details that he needed to show for permit purposes. I am hoping that we are building our forever home, but if not, I would not hesitate to use ERDD again. Money well spent.

name: Holland Dixon
text: They took our vision and produced a work of art allowing me to refine my future building project. Correcting things we didn't see or hadn't thought of and highlighted useful addition needed to be functional. Very professional, always responsive and overall a GREAT company to work with!

name: Renée Dates
text: Multiple phone calls and messages left for a job. All calls are screened and no one will follow-up with repeated requests for assistance. The poor reviews are absolutely correct - THEY DO NOT CALL OR FOLLOW-UP! BEWARE OF THIS COMPANY!

resp.text: You are a customer of our client Bama Sheds. We have been in contact with Bama Sheds.  If  they have not been in contact with you that is not something we can control.

name: Kristie Potts
text: Absolutely terrible. I paid a deposit for future home plans. I was very descriptive when speaking to Christy about my plans- One level barndo, specific interior layouts and sq ft. She explained to me that they certainly could design my plans. I paid a deposit, sent the EXACT exterior structure of what I wanted, along with additional interior layout and door. I heard nothing for several weeks, with many phone call attempt. I received a random email apologizing for the delay, that a family member had an illness. Weeks go by again with no returned calls. Finally, I requested they return my deposit and I would outsource a more reliable designer. I recently received another random email with some generic sketches that were nothing of mine. I responded and asked them if they were able to adequately provide services.- NO RESPONSE. I have since then called multiple times, left multiple messages in request to have my deposit refunded. As of today, I have reported them and contacted my bank. After reading reviews and doing further research( I should have prior to hiring them)I see the EXACT same scam happening over and over. What a waste of my time, money and energy!

resp.text: The project was delivered late but we did provide two options based on the client provided sketch and exterior she was looking for.

name: Brent Timmerman
text:
BEWARE! DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THESE PEOPLE!

I will spare the specifics of my experience, However I will warn any prospective person interested to please read the reviews. They ( The bad reviews)are highly accurate !
These people will take your money, and disappear from communication.  With the exception of lying to you through messenger app.. And then when you are able to contact them from a different phone number that they are not screening,  they will blame you for their VERY UNETHICAL business dealings . With that being said, I have nothing to gain from this review,  however I am out 400.00 for services that I never received,  And based on reviews that I have now read. Christy ( The Owner ) will counter this review saying she refunded my payment, which she lied about on the phone with me , because I followed up with Discover ( My financial source ) and Square ( Her financial source  ) and both confirmed to me that no such transaction had taken place!  These people use every excuse in the book to get away with taking your hard earned money and giving you ABSOLUTELY NOTHING IN RETURN.

STAY AWAY!!!!

LOOK BELOW TO OWNER'S RESPONSE
ITS ALL LIES TOO !!
TRUST. ME

name: Joe Wilson
text:
Very nice people who do excellent work at fair prices.

I plan to use them again soon on another project.

name: Chris Gourley
text: We are happy with our plans from ERDD. They did their best to help us to design our forever home and we are happy with the end results. They were willing to make many changes to the original design which shows they are willing to go the extra mile to make their customers happy. They came to our home initially to see where the house would be built and we had our finished plans within 2 1/2 weeks. They could have finished much quicker but my wife and I made a lot of changes so we went thru about 11 drafts to get to the finished project. The fact that they were willing to work with us to this extent means we would use them again if we ever need an architect again.

name: Jackie Wirth
text: Not an actual client, but based off the repeated and disappointing testimonials of others... I would suggest avoiding this company.  The accusations, articles, and evidence provided are so concerning that these individuals should be investigated.

resp.text: The others that have make claims against us have either been refunded or they did receive their plans and still asked for refunds. There are two sides to every story. I will gladly share any evidence supporting our side of these claims as well if you would like. Our email is listed on this page and my cell phone is (256) 595-1574 If you like further information.

name: Jessica Logan
text: Amazing to work with! They took our general ideas and produced our dream home! Highly recommended!!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Tina Johnson
text: Some people have growing pains and are not always right in the way they handle things. Yes Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers May I made mistakes. But they delivered my plans to me and in a reasonable time. Not everyone is perfect. Some people only want to bash people with negative reviews.

name: Drue Poynter
text: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE SERVICE! We have tried to get in contact several times after sending our deposit. It has been 4 weeks and they have not been able to give us anything. After posting a bad review on Facebook they told us we would have our plans by the end of the week and NOTHING! I would not recommend them to anyone! After reading more reviews this seems to be very a common thing for them!

resp.text: Sir you are not even a customer of ours.

name: Yvette Moss
text: We love these guys! They were very helpful and wanted us to achieve the dream home we were after and never complained about how many times I called! =) I will use then again for other projects if we ever need this type of service!!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Jennifer Parent
text: Super helpful with the design and floor plan of my 1500sq foot barndominium style stick built home. Very patient with my multiple requests for desired changes. We are very grateful and would greatly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Kat Lange
text: Our construction plans came in today and I am beyond excited to start working on building our home together! Elaine Roberts Drafters & Designers went above and beyond to make every single edit to our plans and help us design our perfect dream home. If you know anyone needing house plans this is hands down the best people to go to on all aspects, I cannot say enough about how blessed we are to have worked with them for our barndo design!! Thank y’all!!!

name: Kieth Dunn
text: Reading all these bad reviews reminds me of my experience, which has been going on for four months so far with no resolution. I have had all the same difficulties that the others have described and then some....way too may to list here. I cannot express strongly enough how disgusted I am with these people who proclaim christian doctrine in their emails and website. By the way, the good reviews are from the Parker family, which is another name that they go by.

name: Jaycie Phillips
text: Awful customer service! They will not respond even after payment of house plans!

resp.text:
I do not believe that you are an actual client, but friends with Derrick Loftis. Mr. Derrick Loftis has been issued a refund per his request, he also received plans/drawings in the past.

Thank you
Jimmy Parker

name: Luke Barker
text: Highly recommend Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers for all your design needs.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Barbara Gray
text: I would have to say this is the worst attempt of blueprints I have ever seen. Nothing was to scale, there was no detail information at all, and was not the design we had ask for. Measurements were not all noted. We have had a hard time trying to figure out what we need but thanks to Shaw Building Supply they had to basically redraw in order to estimate the material. These people are not draftsmen at all.  This was just a waste of $1500. I could have drawn this plan better than they attempted to.

resp.text: Ms. Gray, I am sorry you were not satisfied with the plans you received from us. You approved the design and layout prior to the completion of the plans. Per our contract you were allowed to make additional changes as you need/wanted. If you had made attempt to reach us over the discrepancy in the plans we would have address and worked with Shaws on any changes or information that was needed. We provide cad files to all building suppliers per there request on a regular basis. None of which was made by Shaws or yourself.

name: Kelsie Norris
text: Elaine was a pleasure to work with on our recent home designs..

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Andrew Bales
text:
These guys are big no shows! Wasted three or four weeks of my time and did nothing. If you are looking for extra stress, headaches and to p-off your client, then call Elaine Roberts drafting.

REGARDING ELAINE ROBERTS REPLY. That is right I gave you the project told you its urgency and instead of saying "we are too busy to take on projects" you said nothing until weeks had passed and my emails went unanswered. This outfit needs to grow up and learn some business ethics.

resp.text:
Mr. Bales,
It is hard for us to be late on a project we were never hired for. We provided us informaton for a quote and timeline for your project. We sent several emails to you and your office for clarification on a few items, all with no response. It is not our fault that your lack of communication caused your client to be upset with you. Nor could would have completed work on your project without the proper go ahead from you.

name: Creekside Designs
text: We have been working with Jimmy off and on for six months now & he has been very quick and professional. I had to make several changes and Jimmy was prompt and delivered the correct drawings that we needed. I would highly recommend Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers

name: David Vermeulen
text:
We paid a deposit and had a verbal contract to design drawings for permit ready construction plans on 2/3/2019
I received zero updates from ERD&D, we reached out dozen of times per email & phone only to be given the run around. Actually spoke once with Elaine Roberts herself I believe and still no follow up or follow through. As of today 12/11/2019 we are still waiting on a response or communication of any kind. I called and left a message today, lets see if we get any response
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Response from the owner 3 weeks ago
Mr. Vermeulen.
I am sorry that you feel like you slipped though the crack somewhere. We made numerous attempts to contact you thought out the year with no response from you. I will gladly refund your deposit if you would like. Response from the owner 3 weeks ago
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After leaving a review, an email and voicemail with my contact info on 12/11/19 and requesting a refund, I am still waiting for Elaine Roberts to get back to us.
2nd request 1/2/20 - Elaine please refund our deposit.

resp.text:
Mr. Vermeulen.
I am sorry that you feel like you slipped though the crack somewhere. We made numerous attempts to contact you thought out the year with no response from you. I will gladly refund your deposit if you would like. I will be in touch with you this morning to work out the solution that works best for you.

name: Christy Leigh
text: They are amazing! Loved the whole process and they made it so easy and wonderful. Very accommodating to all our changes.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We enjoyed working with you on your home.

name: Paul Hines
text: Great people to work with.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Jimmy Parker
text: Great small little design firm. Husband and wife team that works hard on each project. They are not perfect and have flaws but the work and designs they produce are top notch.

name: Mark Hamm
text: Great work at a reasonable price.  Having some delays in the delivery of the plans is the only reason for not getting a 5.

name: Nona Muss
text:
So last year I found a business on a local small business group Facebook page - Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers. I paid them a deposit of $250. As of today, the work has not been delivered. It was promised 10 days after payment. As of today, they are 100 days past due. I posted an honest review on their Facebook page, starting off by saying I hoped I could change it to a positive review in the near future. They changed their Facebook template to not allow reviews so mine could no longer be seen. They always say they are working on my plan and they will have something in a few days. Then I don't hear from them and nothing is ever delivered. Their Facebook page has photos they post- and therefore imply that the work depicted is their own. Through reverse photo look up I found photos they had "lifted" from other sites and I contacted the owners. Indeed they did not have permission to use the photos and it was not their work. When I tagged the owners in the misused photos they were promptly deleted from the Elaine Roberts drafters Facebook page. One of the owners of the business from which they had plagiarized the photos of others' work, did know Jimmy Parker - one of the owners of Elaine Roberts Drafters. He told me specifics of how the owner (Jimmy) of Elaine Roberts Drafters worked for him previously and had stolen from him, and described him as one of the biggest con-men he has encountered. Perhaps occasionally they deliver a product enough to keep up an image, I don't know, but after my own experience and what I heard from Jimmy Parker's previous employer, I sure wouldn't trust him with my money again!

Also look at their other reviews. Jimmy and Christy Parker are the husband/wife team that “own/operate’ this business they call Elaine Roberts Drafting and Design. (These are their respective middle names.)  Previously they operated under the name “Creekside Designs.” I guess they had to give up on that name after they accumulated so many bad reviews. You can google it. Anyway, three of the other reviews for this business are from the owners themselves (Christy Parker, Jimmy Parker, and their old business named Creekside Designs. A fourth is from a family member - Sheila Parker. So half of the reviews contributing to their “4.1” rating are ones THEY CREATED RATING THEMSELVES! They did the same thing on Yelp until I reported them and Yelp notified me they had removed those reviews because they violated their terms.

resp.text:
Mrs. Hall,
I am terribly sorry for the poor customer service that we provided.  We are not scammers, crooks, or anything of that nature.  We simply took on to much work at one time. It is not an excuse but we are still learning how to deal with our blessing of growing pains.  We are human and make mistakes.   I am terribly sorry that your project fell through the cracks.  In regards to your refund we asked for a mailing address to process you refund and I have not yet received it.

Again we are sincerely sorry for the poor customer service and wish you all the best in the future.
Respectfully,
Christy Parker

name: Christy Parker
text: The team at Elaine Roberts is very professional and there work is top notch

name: Mediocre Photography
text: Off and on service.  Most times it is quick and easy drop offs for me.  One time I was told I had to buy the tape to tape my package up (they had always taped it for me).. So I bought an entire roll of package tape just for that one instance.  Most times the employees are friendly and helpful... But there is a young girl there that isn't friendly and gives one the sense of rudeness just in her lack of personality.  Oh well, thanks to Amazon's new set up that allows me to drop things off without a label, my experiences have been good ones.  🤗

resp.text: Thank you so much for the feedback! We definitely always want to try to have a smile on our faces when our customers walk through the door. Several new employees have started recently for the holiday rush so we apologize if you've experienced anything at all negative or unpleasant. We will be sure to remind all of our employees to keep a positive attitude towards everyone who walks into our store. Thank you!

name: Nathon Roden
text: I have no idea how ups is in other parts of the country but when it hits ft.payne it is the absolute worst shipping company ever. Swear they don't update tracking there 70% of the time. They constantly miss "scheduled delivery time" its so bad I've convinced my company to no longer use them and instead we ship FedEx. I swear I wish Amazon would make FedEx an option.

name: Jess Medley
text:
I had a package sent to Colorado that was time sensitive. I was assured it would be fine and to just let them take care of it. The package ended up getting lost, spent almost a month trying “to locate it”, and then redeliver to the correct address. The people that work at this location do not seem very knowledgeable about their jobs and were of no help, and very rude at that! The shipment was ruined by the time it was actually delivered and when I contacted them to see if I could at least get my money back for the shipping, or anything for that matter, they were extremely rude.
I recommend USPS or The Package Store! Anywhere but here!

name: Mariah Keith
text:
Unexceptable customer service!
Rude seasoned employee and improperly trained "new" one.  Listed as an Amazon no print return drop off facility however they are unable to scan the Amazon generated return label and want to charge you $2.33 for another. Waited for 10+ minutes for them to receive the label that was sent directly to their verified email twice. Asked about alternative options - none. Walked out and took the package to the local "Package Store" in and out in under 2 minutes free off charge.

name: david walker
text: The folks working there were friendly enough.  But I took a file by on Friday afternoon to be printed in book form on better paper stock than normal bond.  This is for an instructional manual for my office.  The printing is fine.  But when I got it back to my office and tried to add it to my 3-ring binder, the holes they punched would not work.  They're not standard.  On top of that, they punched the last 3 chapters and the index completely backwards.  My last time to use The UPS Store for anything.

resp.text: Mr. Walker, thank you for bringing this to our attention.  I am sorry that we did not do a good job.  If you will, let us reprint and punch the holes properly.  We checked the hole puncher and did find it out of adjustment.  It has been fixed.  We are sorry that this has happened.  Thank You.

name: Screw Rti
text: I ordered something that was expensive. My time frame window was between 9-1pm. I have stated home all day to insure the package was not left out too long due to I live in apartments. It’s nearly 5 and the package has not been delivered. These guys really need to stick to there quotes they give people. I’ve wasted my whole day waiting. I will not be using this service again if I can help it.

name: SHARRON “SHERRIE” BANNISTER
text:
I dont recommend this business, I was over charged, given terrible quality photos and was expected to keep.  She refused to make it right, would not give refund.  I wish I could show a picture of the items that I was charged for.

Update:
The owner contacted me and offered a complete refund.   I really appreciate that he was kind and understanding.   He asked for a copy to show the employees at that location the errors that were made.  I believe Larry is an honest business man and he deserves another chance.

resp.text:
Dear Sharron Bannister,

Firstly, we’d like to extend our most sincere condolences on the loss of your loved one. We can’t begin to know exactly what you're dealing with, and we extend our thoughts and prayers to you and your family during this trying time.

Concerning the event in question, we’re both sorry and surprised to hear of the negative experience you had at our store. As we all know, everyone has their own unique take on any given situation, and we’d just like to briefly give ours, so that we are all on the same page. When we assisted the customer on the day in question, we had the customer review and approve the print before moving forward. We do this to ensure that all of our customers are satisfied with the quality before we start running the job, as once we’ve begun, we cannot make adjustments and have already begun incurring costs.

In this case, seeing as the customer reviewed and approved a proof, we simply did not know there was even a concern until your family began leaving several reviews, all of which tell a different story than what we experienced, and candidly, we understand. This is a difficult time for all, and we can absolutely understand how difficult of a time this must be. We're dedicated to not only provided excellent products with equally excellent service, but we’re committed to being a part of the community, and we would never ask a customer to accept a product they weren’t happy with. Had we known there were issues with the prints prior to customer approval, or with the finished product when they were reviewed when you returned to pick them up, we would have done and will do everything possible to rectify this for you, and we’re committed to doing so again in the future.

Your feedback is important to us, and it doesn’t fall on deaf ears.
Thank You,
Larry Stephens

name: Bo Doeg
text: Only use this location if it is last ditch, while the atmosphere was comfortable and quiet the only thing these folks are interested in is how fast they can take your money. The young lady working the counter was rude and completely unhelpful. She had an air if disdain when I asked any questions as if it was just too much to bear. I asked for a next day shipment and was given a regular label. When I asked she just told me that I was doing ok. When I finished the label o asked if that was all I needed to do to get next day shipping, she got upset that I hadn't made it clear I wanted next day shipping. I clearly asked twice for a next day label. Over all I would use the USPS from now on, it is a small wonder that anything gets shipped from this location. This UPS store had garbage service. Customers BEWARE!

name: Logan LeGrande
text: Overpriced and management is rude to employees

name: Kevin Adams
text: So very sad that people choose to make money wrongfully, off the death of others family members. My sisters and I Went to the UPS store in Fort Payne to have some obituary cards printed of our deceased parents, the lady at the counter only let me print one copy and then made copies of that making all but the original very poor quality. On one family members cards the owner mistakenly forgot to turn the paper and double printed over the first copy making it completely impossible to read, but laminated over it anyway and charged me for the unreadable copy. Even worse blamed me for the error even though she was the only one with access to the printer which was behind the counter. Great way to run a business, blaming the customer for your error and even worse selling a product that was meant to be a gift that can’t even be read. When my sister took the cards back to the store the owner refused to try to make it up or even give a  refund while screaming and insulting my sister. A very expensive lesson since we were over charged to begin with and still are without the obituary cards. This is a very dishonest way of doing business, not worthy of anyone’s business. We will never do business with that store again.

"DHL" and "USPS" giving customers more options instead of just one choice.

Even when I pointed out mistakes or issues they corrected them with no arguing or hassle.
They have a genuine concern for their clients and their circumstances which I have witnessed on various occasions.  This is a character and quality rarely demonstrated in any profession today but it is a standard of their business and I commend them for their excellent customer service.  If you are looking to brand your business or to build your next signage for your business and if you want the best in customer service then go see Fast Sign and you will never regret it!

Hi Vibity 360,

Thank you,
The UPS Store 6732
334-417-0051

Walmart and lowes both sell boxes.

Dear Ben Solo,
We want to sincerely apologize for your negative experience in our store. However, we'd like to learn more about your situation and what exactly happened. We want to make things right. So, please give us a call on 334-417-0051. You can also email us at store6732@theupsstore.com and we will get back to you promptly. We look forward to hearing from you and earning you back your business.

name: Georgia Ford
text: Today one of your men delivered 2 boxes to my house 87 Bryan Ct. Dora, AL.  I am in a wheel chair and it takes me a bit to answer the door.  It was pouring down rain and he banged on the door and left the boxes on the porch in the rain and ran back to his truck.  By the time I got to the door and got it opened he was driving off.  This was the worst possible thing he could have done.  I am not happy.

resp.text: I sincerely apologize for the inadequate service.  We, however, at The UPS Store, have nothing to do with drivers or deliveries.  We are a Franchise of UPS, and have Retail establishments only.  The best possible thing that you can do, is to call UPS Customer Service and explain your situation.  They will be more than happy to message the hub in Birmingham, where this driver comes from, and let them know of your circumstances, so that this won't happen again.  Although we actually had nothing to do with this delivery, here at The UPS Store, along with UPS, value your business and appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We will pass it along to UPS so they can deal with it accordingly.  Their phone number is 1-800-742-5877.  It is a voice prompt system, so if you'll simply say, "Missed delivery" a few times, it will pass you along to a live operator.  Thank you again for your business and if we can help you in any way at The UPS Store in Jasper, we'll be more than happy to do so.  Jeff Graham, Owner

resp.text: We never have more than a 10 minute wait in our store. Complex print jobs do sometimes take longer, but there are always 2 or more employees and we pride ourselves on our quick and competent customer service. I'm sorry that you had a bad experience and we'd love to have the chance to make it right. I've owned this store for over 15 years now, and wouldn't be here without the strength of my staff, the ability to solve problems, and the great customers that come into my store time and time again.

text: iHeartMedia is America’s #1 audio company, reaching 9 out of 10 American’s every month.    We offer radio, digital, social, podcasts, data and events like the iHeartRadio Music Festival. In addition, we have WTAK, 106.1, classic rock; WBHP, news/talk, 800 and 1230AM and 102.5 FM; KISS-FM, 106.5 playing all of today’s hottest new music; and our newest addition to the Huntsville family, ALT 92.9. text: I normally dont review stores, but it this case I have to!  I walked into the ups store and felt like I was a priority. text: I used ups to make copies. I drop off my copies to be single copy. The employee asked when I would like them. I said as soon as I was ready. The next day I sent someone to pick them up and she was told they won't be ready until sometime Monday, which was fine. But then I get a voicemail like two hours later on Thursday that they are ready. So I sent that same person to pick them up and pay $138.00. I then went over the copies about 400 was single copy, the rest was double copy which was over 1400. I had to separate the papers myself, which I was told by a co-worker they do that.I tired for a week to talk to someone about my order. When I finely did that same person who made my copy told me that I didn't say single and if I want to have them redo I will have to pay again. She pretty much blame me the customer because she didn't hear me. There was no form of any kind for me to fill out leave my instruction. Since she was the manager I ask to speak to the owner. She told me a time but when I called he was not their, I been trying to get ahold of him for a couple of days. I will not be using their service again, ever through they did give me a discount rate since these copies were for my class. I was always told the customer was always right from working in retail before.

name: Connie Hastings
text: I used to work there (PT as neeed) till the owners sold out. The new owners have put a manager in there that doesn't know his but hole from a hole in the ground. They have jacked the prices up. I have customers and Mailbox holders trying to personally contact me at my Fulltime job, trying to get in touch with me or my daughter. (Who also no longer works there) To complain and figure out why their mail is not being sent to them. I am having to tell them We no longer work there. Good luck with that! I am willing to bet they lose A ton of customers we worked hard to get back. Especially after Amy ran it into the ground. (That was 3 owners back)

name: Amanda Koehler
text: I have nothing but good things to say about this place. The manager is very helpful and if he doesnt know the answer to my hard questions he brings up the subject at the weekly meeting. I have dealt with many of the employees at this location and they all have been super nice and helpful.  I always get my faxes and notarizations done quickly.  Keep up the good work. This store is vital to our community.

name: Jennifer Beckworth
text: I didn't feel well, but the girl helped make everything easy and got me taken care of quickly.

name: Freddy Johnson
text: MULTIPLE times I have been waiting for the doors to open at 7:30 am and NOBODY was there. I've waited until 8:30 almost 9 when someone shows up to ask if I could get a notary only to be told they wont be there till 11am.. I came back at 11 and she says they wont be there until 1pm!! I will not be returning. This is a joke.

name: Jim Buckley
text: Had a large package to ship item sold on eBay..had problems at home trying to print shipping label..employee went well above normal assistance to help me resolve issues..will definitely continue to use this location. Fantastic customer service!

name: Mike Boan
text: Price is way too. Over charge compared to others.

name: Evie Byrd
text: I used to love this store but the last few months things have changed & I feel like I'm being ripped off! The prices are outrageous & the service sucks! WORST UPS STORE AROUND!!!!

name: Miranda Sanders
text: Kelly and her co-worker helped me out of a jam!  They're great!

name: shannon moore
text: Shipped a package on the 16th and supposed to be there on the 17th. Now the 22nd and they have rescheduled delivery everyday. Store is of no help. Wants me to call someone in Robertsdale and they were nothing but rude. Still have no idea where this 200 year old family heirloom is and UPS doesnt seem to care in the least.

name: Ashlee Arias
text: Extremely over priced. I was told “We can have the package there by Monday (2 day shipping) from Foley to Spanish fort for $50!!! I said I wanted the cheapest option THEN she says “The cheapest option is $15 and it will ALSO BE THERE BY MONDAY! Needless to say I won’t be going back.

name: red_key_randy
text: The lady upfront need better training before being left alone

name: Camren Wall
text: Tried charging almost $15 for the exact service that costs 2.71 at the post office. These people are thieves!!

name: William Lee
text: Very good that get your package on time

name: Holland Richardson
text: I waited an hour for the opening lady to show. She finally got there.. an hour a half late and then was rude the entire transaction. Her name was Chelsea i think

name: Angela Long (Courageous)
text: Chelsey is incredible!

name: Kristin Trostel
text: Very friendly

name: Janna Craig
text: I cannot express strongly enough how extremely helpful the folks at PostNet were, going above and beyond to help when my original printer for a work project dropped the ball. I called PostNet at 4:30pm, needing flyers printed by the end of the day and they not only printed them for me, but delivered them to our local clinic (I was several hundred miles away and couldn't pick them up), even though they don't typically offer delivery services. I would use them again in a heartbeat and strongly recommend them to anyone else in the Fairhope area.

name: Trinity Vintage Valencia
text: They offer so many different things.  Super convenient and easy.

name: Nikki Blue
text: Fast service, extremely friendly and affordably priced!

name: Kew Taybi
text: You can’t find a better service with the most reasonable prices anywhere!!!! Besides the great prices and prompt service, the owner is very friendly and most helpful to provide you what you really need. I highly recommend Printing Zone and will never go anywhere else for my printing needs.

name: Kimberlee Collins
text:
I just got back from Printing Zone and I will be using them for all my printing needs from now on! I called UPS to check prices and they wanted $3.00 for the first page and a $1.50 for each page after that! Edie the owner was just so sweet, and they did not charge any where near what I would have paid at UPS!
Down to earth customer service with a smile!
Thanks so much and see you soon!
Kim

name: Howard “Ray” Davis
text: I prefer to keep the money I spend in the local community, that's why I was grateful I found this place on my way to the UPS Store. Not only is the Printing Zone a local family owned and operated business, the manager was absolutely professional and made it so simple for me to print a .pdf file, sign it, and fax it. Also, the price was very reasonable, much better pricing than the UPS Store charges. This place is now the print store that I'll use moving forward!

name: K. Allen Foster
text: The owners of this business go out of their way to provide fast, friendly service at fair prices. These are some of the nicest business people one can meet in Gulf Shores!

name: Vickie Hayes
text: Amazing people, outstanding service.  No reason to ever go anywhere else for printing needs. Shop local and experience the best!

name: David Stewart
text: I have owned a few businesses over the last few years I have tried all the other printers around & got a lot of broken promises..These people do a great job and have delivered on every project. I highly recommend Printing Zone..You won't Be Disappointed!!! Thanks Printing Zone For Everything You have done for "Handy Men LLC"

name: H. Troge
text: Great place to do buisness, they treat you like FAMILY. All business should be as good as these people.

name: Chelsea Lacks
text:
Would NOT recommend. Spent $45 on 2 day shipping only to have the address where it was being sent entered in wrong. I spent Over an hour making phone calls to customer service and the store of the city that received  my package (because the Trussville store would not answer over a dozen times that I called) only
to have the current shipping status changed to returning to sender 2 days after it was supposed to be delivered. It was time sensitive and so now it’s contents are no good. Drove to the store and explained the whole order and was asked what I wanted. I told them the very least I wanted the shipping refunded, which I got. I’m still out all the time involved, the package contents, and now I have to do it all over again shipping through somewhere else. I was told they are busy and don’t have time to answer the phone. So if you want your package delivered, go somewhere else. Oh and to top it off, they entered my name and address in wrong as well so it won’t be making it back to me either.

name: Jay Jordan
text: My experience with this store was pretty great, in and out in a minute or two to drop some things off. The staff greeted me and was polite for the interaction.

name: Tonya Willis
text: The customer service in this store is absolute TRASH!!!!!  No help whatsoever!!!!

name: Jeff Martin
text: The customer service in this store is nonexistent. I dropped off a package at their facility and it has completely vanished. Records show that it never left the building. When I called to ask about it I was told that I would have to "get help from UPS"...even though this is UPS. Kept being told "you're not our customer" which is nonsensical. Just pick another location if you need actual help.

name: Mary Parsons
text: I rented 2 books from amazon for my classes. I took both books, printed off both return labels at the ups store and gave them to the boy at the counter. A month later i get a charge and an email from amazon saying my book was not in the package that was sent. When i called ups all he would was call amazon, call amazon, call amazon. Even tho i called amazon and they gave me a refund and cancelled the book from my list, im still not understand how my book was not received when it was the only item in the box. Did they send an empty box? Where is the book? To many unanswered questions.

name: J Green
text: They're fine if you just need to is drop off a package. Beyond that they are unreliable. Mistakes on their end are met with a shrug and a "What do you want me to do about it?" Do not bother asking who you can call to address the problem—they don't know.

name: Debbie Mccay
text: I had an extremely important documents I needed to send overnight from Moody Alabama to Vista California. I paid $44.14 to overnight this package. Yes I signed a paper but didn’t really read it. The clerk did not explain anything to me he acted like there was no problem and that it would get there the next day. What I didn’t know was he sent it through the US Postal Service and that there was no guarantee it would get there the next day. I sent it February 19 thinking it would get there February 20. I did not get there till Saturday the 22nd. And I’m tall too bad so sad by UPS. Those UPS stores are independent and can send an use any carrier service they want. I will never used UPS in Trussville Alabama

name: Eric Taylor
text: I rented a mailbox here today. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The cost was also much more reasonable than I thought it would be. The store, products and services are quite nice. I'm sure I'll be going back for more than just getting my mail.

name: Jamie Clayton
text: Have had to send back several orders and each time I go to the UPS store here in Trussville Alabama I am greeted with nothing but wonderful customer service and they are always eager to help me. My husband for his company and must utilize several things at the UPS Store offers he is very pleased let the customer service team receives

name: Cindy Hafley
text: Michael’s customer service is atrocious. He is who did my transaction and he was so rude I was honestly stunned. He was literally sighing, rolling his eyes, got smart when I said I wanted to “mail” something (“You mean you want to SHIP it?”). You would have thought it was the end of the world when he had to verify my address and it turned out I needed to change it. So unnecessary. I was also shocked when I looked at his name tag and it said he has been there since 1999. From the other reviews I’ve read, I’m not the only person treated like this at this location, so fedex obviously doesn’t care how their employees treat their customers. Trent is great though, for the record.

name: Aries Gates
text:
I rate this experience as a one because I have never been discriminated against in a fedex store until today! I was shipping to packages off today, one to my mortgage company and another to At&t. When I got to the counter the representative told me that AT&T system was down but she would check to see if  it was back up and running. It was still down so she directed me to the UPS store about 1.2 miles away and I went to go get in the car to call ATT before going to UPS to see if this was a outage all over it just Fedex Kinkos. The ATT representative told me they didn’t have a issue so I go back in the store to see if their system was back up. A older lady that I helped in the store before leaving stopped me and said the Caucasian guy behind me earlier had a package he was shipping back to At&t as well. The representative told him that the system was down but she would hold it for him and ship it when the system came back up. I asked the representative when I walked back in the store was the system back up, she replied no it’s still down. I asked could she hold my package and ship it when it come back up, she replied they aren’t allowed to do this.

I replied but you just did it for the Caucasian man who was sending a package to At&t to. She looked shocked!  She replied she isn’t suppose to do that but my problem is you did do it & he was behind me. You sent me to UPS but you didn’t send him! Do you know how this makes me feel (small very small) because I’m Black I can go to UPS but because he is white you can hold it for him and ship it later. I have always used fedex and I’m very disappointed in how I was discriminated against today but you guys will be hearing from me soon. My name is Markita Gates and this took place between 12:30pm & 1:00pm, the guy went to the counter right after me at 12:41pm. This is unacceptable!

name: Rob “Deacon Yomouf” Allbanks
text: Today was a good day! Ask for Leslie, she works!

name: K’Shira Hinkle
text: The associate that I spoke with on the phone is in need of some type of customer interaction training. I was asking about speaking with someone that can talk to a driver about a delivery that is scheduled for today and he said there’s no way to get that done. After I suggested that they implemented a new policy for there to be a way to contact the drivers he then tells me that they don’t deal with the drivers because that location is print and ship only. I then asked why he didn’t inform me of that and give me the number or transfer me to someone that could contact the drivers and he began to get rude. I asked for his name several times and he wouldn’t tell me. Then he put me on hold for the customer service line. Get it together FedEx

name: John Higginbotham
text: I would not recommend this facility for your shipping needs. FedEx in Alabama is a joke. Multiple upon multiple damaged packages and the customer service here is absolutely terrible.

name: Deb Jacobs
text: No one is ever available to help. I'm handicapped.

name: Corey Turner
text:
Went into the store to get a passport photo, simple right?
Not to the employees who didn't want to act enthused to help with anything. First and last visit in one day!

name: Ingrid Schnader
text: I had such a good experience here. I needed to design and print 100 lost dog flyers. I laminated 10 of them. I was in and out within 20 minutes and didn’t have to spend too much money. And I found my dog!! The flyers were beautiful and clear. I will definitely return next time I need something printed!

name: Maya Madden
text: I had a really difficult situation getting my package through customs and needed someone to be as fired up as me about it. I called several international agents and none knew what was going on, I was so worried I was going to lose my merchandise. Amber was really the only one who rose up to the plate and got my situation handled. She went above and beyond calling international on my behalf and my package is safe and sound. THANK YOU AMBER!

name: Steve Dellinger
text:
Always stellar service.  Good people with great attitudes.
I drive across town to use this location, because they are fantastic.

text: I always have a great experience here with the customer service. Very helpful , nice and knowledgeable.

text: Great customer service! Michael was very pleasant and informative.  Location accessible. I wish the location was closer.

text: I normally visit this location and the service is awesome but today my experience was awful everyone had an attitude and 1guy even asked if I could have my kids wait outside which are 4 and 6

text: Go to a UPS store. The self service kiosks are awful

name: Nice Rich
text: Oh My Gosh, what a life saver. I mean, they had a stamp and an envelop and I made 4 overly priced copies, but could not scan them and they couldn't mail my letter for me and the workers didn't seem to want to be there but at least they had a stamp! Is there tax on stamps? I think they charged me tax on stamps?!? I should call the Postmaster. I needed to get the Paternity DNA results to my cousin cuz she was insistent it was my baby but I knew it was her brother's! Maynard struck agian

name: Joel Alakhras
text: Love FedEx specially a shout out to Mrs.Amber Assistance Manager! She makes sure that your treated like a valuable customer!!

name: Andrew Weaver
text: great employees; more helpful service than I expected.

name: jessie pratt
text: They were very professional & respectful nice & that what you go there for🆒💯!!!

name: Bryan Baez
text: I went to my local Ship Center to see if I can ship  a poster to CA. It took the "Store Manager" 7 minutes to finally tell me it would be $50 using there "Super Saver option"  to ship a poster from AL to CA! The so called "store manager" was yawning the whole time I was waiting for him to figure out the shipment details it was (10AM). I went to the post office and shipped for $7.

name: K Melissa Swearingen
text:
I called ahead and spoke with Ellis about passport photo information, and he was the person who assisted me in person, albeit all of the employees were very kind and helpful.

I will be back to this location!

name: Clayetta Montee
text:
UPDATE:  I went to this location yesterday just to look and see if this most unpleasant employee is there.  As happens with large corporations too often, she was PROMOTED to driver.  I couldn't believe a promotion instead of demotion was her reward for running customers off.  However, since she is no longer in the store, if they accept my perfectly good boxes, I will use this branch again.  if not, I will continue to ship through my employer.

PREVIOUS POST: This used to be my favorite shipper and favorite FED EX location.  I even have my own personal Fed Ex account.  However about a year ago Fed Ex must have brought in a new female day manager or supervisor and she behaves like a shrew.  I was believe her name was Helen.  She misquotes Fed Ex's shipping policy and refuses to use "banker's" boxes and other good boxes that are actually more sturdy than she sells at that outlet. She says it is FedEx's policy and I have since found out - it is not FedEx policy, but may be the individual store policy.  But she says it is FedEx policy.  However, she is most loud and belligerent and actually refuses to ship unless in boxes "like she sells" and pulls off the shelf "because Fed Ex will no longer accept those boxes".  Not true.  She won't accept the boxes.  She claims my boxes are not as sturdy (not true) and it is FED EX's policy not to accept those boxes.  Not true.  I've checked Fed Ex's shipping and packing policies and my boxes are very acceptable...and they are more sturdy than the boxes she is trying to force me to buy.  I will no longer ship there but ship through my work and have the charges deducted form my payroll.  Fed Ex is happy to pick up my boxes at my work without trying to make me buy boxes from Fed Ex.  My work place ships many boxes like my boxes (that's where I get my boxes) without any problem.  Someone needs to retrain or terminate the weekday supervisor or manager at this office.  I have read of many complaints about the personnel at FedEx-Kinko locations since Kinko and Fed Ex combined their locations.  I will not go back to this location with Helen there.  When I can't use my work place for shipping (as when the boxes too heavy for me to take in), I have driven 35 miles round trip to drop off my boxes elsewhere instead of dealing with this unpleasant person...what a shrew.

TERRIBLE experience.
